channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Quizlord
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Quizlord

item.title: CVE-2022-4112|2024-08-03T01:27:54.529Z -- unknown -- quizlord
item.description: The Quizlord WordPress plugin through 2.0 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
